name: Impeller
body:
What is it
==========

An early, quite incomplete client for [Pump.io](http://pump.io) which runs on Android Ice Cream
Sandwich and later.

At present, it solves only ~10% of the problem: getting your feed and notifying 
you of updates. Fortunately, that happens to be the most important 10%.

For my future directions, see [this post](https://microca.st/oshepherd/note/Rtud1lE6TzKxdo8YC47Hhg)
on my feed

To try it out, either [check out and build](https://github.com/oshepherd/Impeller) the source or download a [precompiled version](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64151759/Impeller.apk)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
